e="preserve">Steve Lightle (November 19, 1959 – January 8, 2021) was an American comics artist. He worked as a penciller. He was best known as the artist of DC Comics' "Legion of Super-Heroes" and "Doom Patrol" titles. He was born in Kansas.
Lightle died on January 8, 2021 from cardiac arrest caused by COVID-19 at the age of 61.
